BUILT TO LAST

Both Ghost Rider tiers are built to the highest quality using the finest materials.

GHOST RIDER ALPHA

Our enthusiast bike - a step ahead of the competition, versatile and durable. The Alpha is the perfect mix of Aggressiona nd comfort.

GHOST RIDER OMEGA

The competitive model - sacrifices the everyday comfort in order to maximise speed and reduce weight to wring every last meter per second out of your ride.
